name: Play Cube with Uncle Billy
description:
caution！caution！caution！This game will not match your expectations, please buy with caution。



Very Simple Introduction：

Experience the difference between cube games

Small cube of different shapes formed by the board gradually fall from the top of the screen, allowing the player to spell out the complete one or several of the bottom of the screen by adjusting the position and orientation of the cube. These full bars will disappear, vacating the newly fallen cube, noting that the box will be completely eliminated and that the Not eliminated box will not fall. At the same time, players earn points and get higher scores. Not eliminated cube continue to pile up, once stacked at the top of the screen, the player loses and the game is over.

World rankings let you know how much your friends are between your friends, and you know the great players in the world are trying to challenge themselves in the world

Simple operating：

Change side
↑

Left← →right

↓
Fast down



Curiosity, why do you want to buy this game.
